error_details.explanation: Incorrect operand. The variable 'randy_initial_money' (value: 3000) was used instead of 'randy_money_after_smith' (value: 3200).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 1800
After Smith gave him $200, Randy had 3000+200=<<3000+200=3200>>3200 dollars.
The value of the rest of the money is 3000-1200=<<3000-1200=1800>>1800 dollars.
